title: CryptoBit Solutions
author: CryptoBit Solutions
content: Crypto exchange services in EU countries https://cryptobit.solutions/ write in any messengers. So, if someone needs to exchange crypto for fiat - it is like a piece of cake!

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I checked reviewing sites, you have no rating. Which means you can not be trusted. Anyone that uses your service is at risk of losing money. I checked when your domain was created, it was last year September.  At least you supposed to have some ratings on reviewing site by now.Yet your exchange is still very young. Maybe the site is good, I do not know, but I am just saying that people that use your service should know that there can be possibility of them to be scammed.

Because what I had found on the trustpilot review was not a good oneaccording to those who tried to used and they said that they were scammed by the exchange platform(cryptobit)here is the evidence https://www.trustpilot.com/review/cryptobit.inkSo be careful to everyone who still be curious to use it, good luck

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoBit Solutions on July 03, 2023, 07:55:17 AMQuote from: Oshosondy on July 03, 2023, 06:31:55 AMI checked reviewing sites, you have no rating. Which means you can not be trusted. Anyone that uses your service is at risk of losing money. Maybe the site is good, I do not know, but I am just saying that people that use your service should know that there can be possibility of them to be scammed.So you are right. We are a young cryptocurrency exchanger. But this does not mean that we deceive customers.        -   But why does the cryptobit solution exchange https://www.trustpilot.com/review/cryptobit.solutions not have a review rating? That means anyone is afraid to try your platform? What do you think is the reason why no one is trying ot use your exchange?It's clear that you don't have any users who have actively dared to use it, even for a while now there still isn't any, but here it seems to be surprising and makes me think. Why don't you try a good strategy to attract investors to your platform exchange.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I will advice people not to use the site if they want to avoid scam.Quote from: bettercrypto on July 03, 2023, 07:00:45 AMYes you were right, the exchange site platform is not a good to use in. Because what I had found on the trustpilot review was not a good oneaccording to those who tried to used and they said that they were scammed by the exchange platform(cryptobit)here is the evidence https://www.trustpilot.com/review/cryptobit.inkSo be careful to everyone who still be curious to use it, good luck I do not trust new sites, but that link you gave belongs to crytobit[dot]]ink not the site that OP mentioned above. I just want to make this clear but I still maintain my stance that people should be careful of this kind of exchanges, it is new and it has no review. One of the reviewing sites that I checked about it is Trustpilot, no review there too. This is Trustpilot review about the site: https://www.trustpilot.com/review/cryptobit.solutions@OP, I will advice you to have good marketing strategy. This will help you and you will be able to gain people's trust. Without marketing new services and websites, people can not have believe in it until you market your service to show people how serious you are. From marketing, people will see your site and they will try it. If they like it, some people they will give you positive reviews on reviewing sites. That is how it works. Scammers do not have time or money for marketing, all they know is to deceive people to use their new created website. Some scammers can have the a domain created, leaving it for months before they will begin to look for people to scam. You can be one and you may not be one. While some scammers are not that patient. Your site may be legit, but you have to prove that.I still remain myself. I can not use the site unless I am convinced to use it, but you have nothing to convince people to believe in your site yet and best for people not to use it if they want to avoid possible scam.

Without marketing new services and websites, people can not have believe in it until you market your service to show people how serious you are. From marketing, people will see your site and they will try it. If they like it, some people they will give you positive reviews on reviewing sites. That is how it works. Scammers do not have time or money for marketing, all they know is to deceive people to use their new created website. Some scammers can have the a domain created, leaving it for months before they will begin to look for people to scam. You can be one and you may not be one. While some scammers are not that patient. Your site may be legit, but you have to prove that.I still remain myself. I can not use the site unless I am convinced to use it, but you have nothing to convince people to believe in your site yet and best for people not to use it if they want to avoid possible scam.We are on the monitors (logo and link in the footer of our site), on social networks https://instagram.com/cryptobit_official?igshid=MzRlODBiNWFlZA== and there is no need to drown us right away  You will not be able to leave a review here https://cryptobit.solutions/ua/reviews if you do not make an exchange. In this way, we protect ourselves from accusations of "bought" reviews.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: I gave a glance at your website and firstly the language was not in English and i do not find any way to change that plus small mistakes like these among others will discourage others to not give a try to new platforms. Which of course are filled with unexpected offers and due to the bad reputation of new exchanges for rug pulling/scamming. People have left to give them a try even.It takes too much time for an exchange to build its reputation among the users and once you will make that trust you will grow like grass. But to till then you have to work on your steps to build trust among competitor's customers and why we should prefer you, other than the fact that you are luring people by making unbelievable offers. Like most of the new exchange make, For example, trading competitions, swapping competitions, etc. And once people started to take part exchange gained liquidity and left the market.
